generated_text:
- road: The cobblestone surface extending from the foreground to the background, with the Mercedes-Benz emblem visible on the hood, indicates a road.
- sidewalk: The paved area on the left side of the road, adjacent to the building, is designated for pedestrians and is separated from the road by a curb.
- building: The structures lining both sides of the street, including the modern building on the left and the traditional houses on the right, are buildings.
- wall: The large, plain, light-colored surface on the left side of the image is a wall.
- fence: The construction barrier with banners on the right side of the street is a fence.
- pole: The vertical support posts holding up the construction banners on the right are poles.
- vegetation: The tree visible behind the fence on the right side of the street is vegetation.
- terrain: The patch of grass and dirt visible behind the fence on the right side of the street is terrain.
- sky: The overcast, gray sky visible above the rooftops and buildings is sky.
- person: Two individuals are walking on the sidewalk on the left side of the street.
- car: A white car is parked on the street in the distance, visible between the buildings on the right side.
